    -   **add credibility** to your work :bulb:
    -   **provide** context for your work :construction:

## APA 7: Journal Articles {.smaller}

![](images/reference_page.png){.absolute top="0" right="10" width="65" height="70"}


::: body
The general format is:

::: {style="text-indent: -1em; padding-left: 2em"}

[Author, A. A., Author, B. B., & Author, C. C.]{.fragment fragment-index="1" style="color: #d00000;"} [(Year of publication).]{.fragment fragment-index="2" style="color: #249ab5;"} [Title of article.]{.fragment fragment-index="3" style="color: #005d84;"} [*Title of Journal*,]{.fragment fragment-index="4" style="color: #f58a1f;"} [*volume number*]{.fragment fragment-index="5" style="color: #001226;"} [(issue number),]{.fragment fragment-index="6" style="color: #bccb2a;"} [pages.]{.fragment fragment-index="7" style="color: #a5228d;"} [https://doi-org.libproxy.unl.edu/10.1111/j.1740-1461.2011.01230.x]{.fragment fragment-index="8" style="color: #808080;"}
:::

::: callout-tip
## EXAMPLE

::: {.fragment fragment-index="1"}
::: {style="text-indent: -1em; padding-left: 2em"}
[Rachlinski, J. J., Guthrie, C., & Wistrich, A. J.]{.fragment fragment-index="1" style="color: #d00000;"} [(2011).]{.fragment fragment-index="2" style="color: #249ab5;"} [Probable Cause, Probability, and Hindsight.]{.fragment fragment-index="3" style="color: #005d84;"} [*Journal of Empirical Legal Studies*,]{.fragment fragment-index="4" style="color: #f58a1f;"} [*72*]{.fragment fragment-index="5" style="color: #001226;"}[(51),]{.fragment fragment-index="6" style="color: #bccb2a;"} [157--180.]{.fragment fragment-index="7" style="color: #a5228d;"} [https://doi-org.libproxy.unl.edu/10.1111/j.1740-1461.2011.01230.x]{.fragment fragment-index="8" style="color: #808080;"}
:::
:::
:::
:::
